meanings.definition: Epimachinae is a subfamily of birds in the family Paradisaeidae, the birds-of-paradise. It contains the long-tailed birds-of-paradise.
meanings.english_definition: A subfamily of birds in the family Paradisaeidae, containing the long-tailed birds-of-paradise.

etymology.value: From the genus name Epimachus, combined with the suffix '-inae' which is used in zoological nomenclature to denote a subfamily.
